h1.ActOnSpecifiedCommercialTransactions: Representation under the Act on Specified Commercial Transactions

Label.PleaseEnterWatcherName: Enter the name of the person who will see the movie.
Label.Name: Name
Label.TermsGuideText: Read through the Terms of use. Click the Accept the Terms of Use and click on the Next button to proceed.
Label.SelectSeatsGuideText: Select a seat and click on the Next button.
Label.SelectTicketsGuideText: Select the type of ticket and click on the Next button.
Label.EnterProfileGuideText: Fill in the form and click on the Next button.
Label.ConfirmReservationGuideText: Check purchase application details and click on the Proceed to Payment button.
Label.ConfirmReservationGuideTextNoPayment: Check the details and click on the Next button.
Label.CompleteReservationGuideText:
Thank you for your purchase.
Show a printout of the following QR code or show the QR code on the screen of your smartphone to enter the cinema.
We have sent an email including the QR code to you at your specified email address. You can also show the email as an admission ticket.
Label.CompleteTemporaryReservationGuideText:
Now your tentative reservation is complete.
An email was sent to you that includes the details of the tentative reservation.
Make a payment at the nearest FamilyMart location to complete the purchase.
Label.ReleaseSeatsGuideText: Select the date to release cancelled seats and click on the Release cancelled seats button.
Label.RedirectToThirdPartyWebsite: You will be redirected to a third-party website.
Label.RequireCustomerNumberAndConfirmationNumb: Your customer number and the confirmation number below are required at the time of payment.

Button.BackToMyPage: Return to your account information page
Button.BackToSelectPerformance: Return to Select the show time
Button.AcceptTermsAndNext: Accept the Terms of Use and click on the Next
Button.ReserveMoreSameShow: Reserve more tickets for the same show time.

FieldName.name: Name (in katakana)
FieldName.remember: Enable automatic log in from the next time

Message.regexTelRange{{fieldName}}{{min}}{{max}}: Check that the number of digits for {{fieldName}} is {{min}} or more but does not exceed {{max}}.
Message.SettingForLimitingEmailReception: Cancel the setting for limiting email reception to the specified domains for you mobile phone.
Message.UseHalfWidthAlphanumericWithoutHyphens: Use half-width alphanumeric. Do not use hyphens.
Message.seatsLimit{{limit}}: The maximum number of seats is {{limit}}.
Message.UnexpectedError: A system error has occurred. Please try again later. Sorry for the inconvenience.
Message.UnavailableSeat: The seat that you have selected is not available.
Message.SelectedSeatsUnavailable: The seat that you have selected is not available.
Message.NoMoreReservation: You have already selected the maximum number of seats.
Message.regexTel: Use half-width alphanumeric. Do not use hyphens.
Message.AreYouSureCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel your reservation?
Message.InvalidSeatCode: The seat number that you have selected is invalid.
Message.ConfirmCancelSelectedTickets: Do you want to cancel the selected reservation?

Avalilable.Name: Unoccupied
Avalilable.Caption: Click on a seat to select it

Selected.Name: Selected
Selected.Caption: Click on a seat to cancel the selection

ConfirmNotesText:
- We will not refund, exchange, or re-issue tickets.
- Under the Tokyo Metropolitan Ordinance Regarding the Healthy Development of Youths, persons younger than 18 years old are prohibited to enter cinemas/theaters from 11:00 p.m. to 4:00 a.m.
This also applies to cases where they are accompanied by a guardian.
- If you want to activate the feature of limiting email reception to the specified domains, specify XXXXXX@XXX.XXX.
